The loan will be used to purchase more human medicine and cosmetics for sale, and will help Faridah to generate greater profits and growth in business. Faridah hopes that in the future she will be able to expand the business. 

Faridah is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP). The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Faridah who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to purchase more human medicine and cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Esther Alouch

texts.en: Esther is a Kiva borrower. She describes herself as an ambitious person. She operates a tailoring shop where she makes new clothes and also repairs clothes. She describes her family challenge to be a lack of enough and safe water for domestic use. She will use the 26,500 KES loan to buy a 4000 litre water tank to store clean water for domestic use. She hopes that in the future, she will purchase a larger water tank. This is her second loan with SMEP DTM. Her previous loan of 20,000 KES was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy a 4000 litre water tank

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is 54 years old and is from Nyahururu. She is married and is blessed with two children, ages ten and six years old.

Nancy has been growing food crops, such as maize, beans, potatoes and kale, for the past four years. To enable her to hire laborers to assist with maize harvesting and shelling, and to prepare the land for the next planting season, she has applied for her third loan, in the amount of 60,000 KES, from KADET LTD.

Her monthly income right now is 15,000 KES and her intentions are to use the anticipated profits from her expanded business to start another business of selling cereals and to educate her children. Her hopes and dreams for her business and family in the future are to own a very big piece of land and to be the most successful farmer in her region.

loans.use: To hire laborers to assist with harvesting of maize and shelling, and to prepare the land for the next planting season.

loans.name: Steven

texts.en:
Steven is a thirty-two-year-old married man with four children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. 

He is a farmer who grows cocoa and he ventured into the sector to get income to support his family. He also does brick laying and trades in palm oil and produce sales. After realizing that his cocoa business was not sufficient to meet the market demand, he decided to buy from other farmers at a lower rate and sell with a mark up. His dream is to have a cocoa store in order to supply cocoa to big companies despite unpredictable weather changes that affect his profits.

Steven intends to use the loan to buy more cocoa to sell.

loans.use: to buy more cocoa to sell

loans.name: Raheli

texts.en: Raheli has operated a tailoring business, making garments for both men and women. She cites seasonality as her major challenge. Here again she comes to you requesting a loan of 50,000 KES to purchase cloth materials and sewing threads for her business. She appreciates the support from Yehu and Kiva at large.

loans.use: to purchase cloth materials and sewing threads for her business

loans.name: Vicent

texts.en: Vicent lives in a nearby trading centre. Vicent deals in raising and trading goats alongside pineapple growing. He is requesting a loan of UGX 1,500,000 to help him buy more goats for resale, to buy veterinary drugs for them and to use the rest of the money to pay tuition for his children. His major challenge is diseases, which usually attack his goats, and thieves who steal his goats after he has invested his loan money, affecting his cash flow. Vicent is very honest and hard working.

loans.use: to buy more goats and veterinary drugs

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en: Patricia is a married lady with five children hailing from Rwentondo Kakoba, a suburb in the Mbarara Municipality. Unfortunately, the husband is earning and doesn’t mind about the family needs and even children’s school fees. She operates a business dealing in second hand clothes and it’s where she earns a living and survival for the whole family. She even managed to save some money and constructed a house.  She is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 to complete the house. She is excited about the loan since this will soon reduce her burden on renting.

loans.use: to complete her house

loans.name: Tobias

texts.es: Tobías es originario de la ciudad de Jinotega, tiene 51 años de edad. Casado y padre de cuatro hijos ya independientes. Se dedica al servicio de guarda de seguridad, el cual ha trabajo mucho tiempo. Lo que le ha permitido llevar ingresos a su hogar, así sustentarse  día a día. Su meta próxima es tener un hogar limpio y seguro. Solicita el crédito para mejorar el saneamiento de su vivienda, con el fin de garantizarse una mejor calidad de vida. Estima que este crédito será muy beneficioso, por que lograra una red de saneamiento adecuado, higiénico y seguro. Su pan futuro es seguir mejorando las condiciones de su domicilio.
texts.en:
Tobías is from the city of Jinotega, and is 51 years old, married, and the father of four children who are already independent.

He earns his living as a security guard, which he has worked at for a long time. This has allowed him to bring income home, thus supporting himself day by day. 

His next goal is to have a clean and secure house. He is asking for the loan to improve the sanitation of his home, with the goal of guaranteeing a better quality of life. 

He believes this loan will be very beneficial because he will achieve an adequate, hygenic and secure sanitation network. His future plan is to continue improving the conditions of him home.

loans.use: to improve home sanitation.

loans.name: Arnaldo

texts.es:
Arnaldo es una persona que piensa en su futuro, él está trabajando como policía para poder cubrir los gastos de sus estudios y tener un título universitario y así poder ayudar a la gente de su comunidad.
Él está estudiando la carrera de derecho, y cuenta que por medio de sus estudios quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas y así sentirse un profesional útil.
Pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus clases y cuotas, y así poder seguir estudiando.
texts.en: Arnaldo is a person who thinks about his future. He is working as a police officer so he can cover the expenses of his studies and have a university degree, and this way he can help the people of his community. He is studying a law degree, and says that he wants to use his studies to be able to help other people and so feel like a useful professional. He requests this loan to invest in the payment of his classes and fees, so he can continue his studies.

loans.use: to pay for university fees and classes.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es:
Andres acaba de terminar su carrera de Abogacía, a la vez está estudiando la carrera de Licenciatura en  Administración de Empresa.
Él es una persona que se esfuerza mucho por poder crecer y salir adelante, y poder ser el día de mañana un gran profesional.
El pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas y pagar sus clases, lo que le permitirá seguir creciendo y mejorando, a la vez que está cerca de su meta.
texts.en:
Andres has just finished his law degree, while he is also studying for an undergraduate degree in Business Administration. He is a person who makes a great effort now to be able to grow and get ahead, and to be able to be a great professional in the future. 

He requests this loan so he can invest it in the payment of his fees and classes, which will allow him to continue growing and improving, while he is close to his goal.

loans.use: to pay for university fees and for classes

loans.name: Niño Jesus Group

texts.es:
El grupo Niño Jesus está en su 6° ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 6 de ellas se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Lilian es una persona muy trabajadora, que se dedica a la venta de ropas, siempre tiene muy buena variedad y es eso lo que atrae a su clientela. Gracias a que es muy buena vendedora le está yendo muy bien. 
La Sra. Lilian con este crédito comprara nuevas prendas variadas para poder surtirse y dar una buena variedad a sus clientes, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The loan group Niño Jesus is in its 6th cycle of the women's committee program, where they all work and help each other to get ahead. They are doing the poverty elimination survey, in which six of them have found themselves to be below the poverty line. 

One of the members is Lilian, a very hardworking person, who works selling clothes. She always has a very good variety, and this is what attracts her customers. As she is a very good saleswoman, it's going quite well for her. Lilian will use this loan to buy various new items so she can have a stock and offer her clients a good variety. This will help her to solidify her business plan, which will help her to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy various items of clothing to sell

loans.name: Lilian

texts.es:
Lilian es diseñadora de su propia línea de Calzados, los diseña y un zapatero particular se los confecciona  para venderlos entre sus familiares, compañeros de estudio y conocidos. 
Ella está estudiando la carrera de administración de empresas, y cuenta que sus metas futuras son montar su propia empresa, la cual pueda administrar y gerenciar ejerciendo su profesión, poder estudiar post grados e idiomas. Con esto espera realizarse profesionalmente y también lograr su progreso y el bienestar de su familia.
Ella pide de este crédito para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su universidad, y también para cubrir sus gastos de clases.
texts.en:
Lillian is a designer of her own line of footwear. She designs them and a particular shoemaker manufactures them to sell to family members, classmates and acquaintances.

She is studying for a career in business management. Her future goals are to start her own business which she can manage, to manage practicing her profession and to be able to study postgraduate in languages. With this, she hopes to establish herself professionally and achieve progress and the well-being of her family.

She is asking for this loan to invest in paying for university fees and to cover the costs of her class.

loans.use: to pay for university fees and college classes.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
El comité Maria Auxiliadora  nace mediante la gestión de la de una de las integrantes, este comité se fijó como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una de ellas, son reconocidas en el lugar como mujeres muy trabajadoras. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 6 se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Teresa, quien se dedica a la venta de ropas usadas y a la vez es limpiadora, se debe destacar que ella es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora, que quiere salir adelante y lo demuestra por medio de su empeño y entusiasmo.
La Sra. Solicita este crédito para la compra de ropas, que le permitirá poder seguir con sus ventas y ofrecer una buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The Maria Auxiliadora committee was born through the management of one of the members. This committee has set the growth of each woman as their main objective. 

They are recognized in their area as very hardworking women. They are doing a survey of poverty elimination and found six below the poverty line.

One of the members is Teresa, who earns her living selling used clothes, and also as a cleaner. It should be emphasized that she is a very hardworking person and a fighter who wants to get ahead, as shown through her commitment and enthusiasm.

She is asking for this loan to purchase clothes that will allow her to continue with her sales and offer a good variety to her customers.

loans.use: to buy various items to sell.

loans.name: Nuevo Horizonte Group

texts.es:
Nuevo horizonte está en su décimo ciclo del programa de comité, además forma parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde todas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, que les podrá ayudar a conocer la situación en la que cada una está. Todas a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo se encuentran mejorando su situación de pobreza.
Una de ellas es la Sra. Emilce, quien se dedica a la venta de comidas en general que ella misma hace. Gracias a que tiene muy rica sazon le esta yendo muy bien y se ha hecho de una clientela fiel que siempre gusta de sus comidas y compran de ella.
Pide de este préstamo ya que necesita comprar insumos para su negocio, y de esa forma poder seguir haciendo sus delicias. Quiere comprar carne, verduras, condimentos, etc, que le permitirá seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Nuevo Horizonte [New Horizon] is in their 10th loan cycle of the committee program. They are also part of the poverty elimination program and they are all taking the poverty elimination survey, which can help them to understand each of their individual situations. All of the women, through their effort and continuing hard work, are improving their situation with regards to poverty. 

One of them is Emilce, who works selling a variety of foods that she makes herself. Thanks to the delicious taste she has, it is going very well for her and she has loyal customers who always like her food and buy from her. She requests this loan as she currently needs to buy supplies for her business,so she can continue making her delicacies. She wants to buy meat, vegetables, condiments, etc., which will allow her to continue growing the business.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, condiments, etc.

loans.name: Virgen Del Carmen 2 Group

texts.es:
Este grupo llamado Virgen del Carmen 2, está dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde una de las integrantes es la Sra Ananias, quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, es decir con bajo nivel de ingresos, pero ella es consciente que a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo podrá ir mejorando.
También participa muy activamente de las capacitaciones, y de esa forma va mejorando. Ella está emprendiendo en la venta de joyas, y pide de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de joyas variadas, lo cual le ayudará a trabajar, y así mejorar sus ingresos. Agradece por esta ayuda que recibe, la cual es una gran oportunidad.
texts.en:
This group, called Virgen del Carmen 2, is part of the poverty elimination program. One of the members is Ananias, who demonstrated a poverty level within the first level in her survey, meaning she has a low income.  But she is aware that through effort and hard work she can improve. She also participates very actively in the trainings, and in this way she is improving bit by bit. 

She is starting to work in jewelry sales, and requests this loan so she can invest it in the purchase of various jewelry, which will help her to work, and to improve her income. She is grateful for this help that she receives, which is a great opportunity.

loans.use: to buy various jewelry to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy vegetables, meat, condiments, and more

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
Virgen de Fatima está formando parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde todas las integrantes están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, para poder conocer en que puntos ellas se encuentran sensibles, y conforme a eso trabajar.
Zulma es una persona digna de destacar, quien se dedica a hacer alimentos, y que después se encarga de vender, su trabajo es muy sacrificado ya que empieza desde muy tempranas horas, y de esa forma va ganándose la vida. Su sueño es poder tener un gran local de comida y poder deleitar a más clientes.
Pide este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de materia prima para sus comidas, como huevo, condimentos, carnes, pollo, etc., lo que le será de mucha ayuda a la hora de cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
The Virgen de Fatima group is part of the poverty elimination program, where all the members are taking the poverty elimination survey, so they can know where their weak points are, and work accordingly. 

Zulma is a person who deserves to stand out. She works making food and later she sells it as well. Her work requires a lot of sacrifices as she begins at very early hours, and in this way she makes her living. Her dream is to be able to have a big restaurant and to be able to delight more customers. 

She requests this loan so she can invest it in buying ingredients for her foods, such as eggs, condiments, meats, chicken, etc., which will be of great help when she is fulfilling the needs of her customers.

loans.use: to buy eggs, condiments, meats, chicken, etc.

loans.name: Anastasiya

texts.ru:
Анастасия – из Кардашинки. Она 6 лет занимается тепличным хозяйством. На 50 сотках выращивает ранние и поздние овощи – 9 000 кустов помидор и 3 000 кустов огурцов. 
Сумма в 30 000 гривен понадобилась Анастасии для того, чтобы построить дополнительные теплицы для предстоящего сельскохозяйственного сезона. Анастасия планирует и в дальнейшем заниматься этим бизнесом и расширять тепличное хозяйство, обновляя прежние и строя новые теплицы.
texts.en:
Anastasiya is from Kardashinka. She has been in the business of greenhouse farming for the last 6 years. On 50 decares of land she grows spring and winter vegetables - 9,000 tomato plants and 3,000 cucumber plants.

Anastasiya needs 30,000 hryvnia to build additional greenhouses for the upcoming agricultural season. Anastasiya plans to continue with this business in the future and expand her greenhouse farming, renovating her current greenhouses and constructing new ones.

loans.use: to construct additional greenhouses.

loans.name: Mamlakat

texts.ru:
Мамлакат живет на районе Шахритус. Ей 59 лет. Мамлакат давно в разводе с мужем. У нее есть двое детей. Ее сын и дочь живут и работают в Российской Федерации. Сама Мамлакат работает кассиром в государственном учреждении. Ее зарплата очень маленькая. Маламлакту помогают ее дети. 
   Домашнее имущество Мамлаката совсем устарела, и она старается понемногу обновлять свои домашние апартаменты. Она просит кредит, чтобы купить мебель. Ее старая мебель стала совсем неудобной, и она хочет, чтоб в ее доме было для нее комфортно. Мамлакат верит и надеется, что сможет приобрести желаемую мебель.
texts.en:
Mamlakat lives in the Shahrituz District. She is 59 years old. Mamlakat divorced her husband a long time ago. She has two children. Her son and daughter live and work in the Russian Federation. Mamlakat works as a cashier at a state institution. Her salary is very low. Mamlakat's children help her. 
  
Mamlakat's household goods are completely worn out. She tries to replace the household goods in her apartment little by little. She is requesting a loan to buy furniture. Her old furniture has become completely uncomfortable and she would like her home to be comfortable for her. Mamlakat believes and hopes that she will be able buy her desired furniture.

loans.use: to buy furniture.

loans.name: Ave Fenix Group

texts.es:
Ave Fenix está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de, donde ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, que forma parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza implementado por fundación paraguaya.
Marta se dedica a la venta de carbón, y cuenta que está mejorando bastante, ya que se está vendiendo más el carbón por ser más económico, y así se está haciendo de muy buena clientela. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora.
Pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de carbón, que le permitirá seguir creciendo y mejorando, y también podrá cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group Ave Fenix [Phoenix Bird] is in their second cycle of the committee program, where they are taking the poverty elimination survey as part of the poverty elimination program implemented by the Fundación Paraguaya. 

Marta works selling coal, and says that things are improving a lot, as she is now selling more coal because it is more economical, and so she is getting very good customers. She is a very hardworking person. She requests this loan so she can invest it in the purchase of coal, which will allow her to continue growing and improving, and also to fulfill her commitment to her customers.

loans.use: to buy coal to sell

loans.name: Jacob

texts.en: Jacob is a 28-year-old ambitious man living in Masindi, Uganda. He runs a video library which he sells and rents videos to his customers. Like most business men in this field he is faced with a challenge of an inefficient supply of electricity which makes the cost of operating a generator high. His plans are to install solar panels and also open another outlet in the nearby town. Jacob is requesting a loan to buy CD's to burn more videos and songs.

loans.use: to buy CD's to burn more videos and songs.

loans.name: Kishwar

texts.en:
Kishwar is a 35-year-old lady. She is the mother of two daughters and two sons. Her husband owns a workshop in which he provides the services to maintain bicycles. He is a professional in his work and can easily fix the bicycles in no time. He has to use various types of tools for repairs. A few days ago he moved his workshop to another place. During the move some important and expensive tools have been misplaced.
Kishwar has requested a loan for her husband so that her husband will be able to compensate against this loss. In addition, he will buy spare parts, tires, breakpads, etc for bicycle repair.
She wants to provide a better education and living standard for her children. She is hopeful that her husband will utilize this amount in positive way and his monthly income will increase. She thanks Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy tools and additional spare parts such as tires, breakpads, etc. for repairing bicycles.

loans.name: Muzafar

texts.ru:
Музафару 56 лет. Он дехканин. Музафар имеет большую и дружную семью. Жена Музафара домохозяйка. Она занимается воспитанием детей. Старший сын Музафара находиться на заработках заграницей. Он уехал, чтобы улучшить жизненные условия своей семье. Другие дети Музафара (два сына и дочка) живут с ним. 
   Около двух лет Музафар занимается растениеводством. Для него это единственная деятельность и на сегодняшний день единственный источник дохода в его семью. 
  В Таджикистане зима приходит позднее, чем в других странах. Поэтому у Музафара есть еще шанс посеять пшеницу на своем земельном участке. Причина, по которой он поздно начал посев, это нехватка средств. Музафар решил взять кредит для покупки  минеральных удобрений, горючей смеси для трактора и пшеничных зерен, чтобы  поскорее закончить посев, потому что если он не успеет, то весной останется без урожая. Музафару нужна помощь. Помогите ему!
texts.en:
Muzafar is 56 years He is a farmer. Muzafar has a large and close-knit family. Muzafar's wife is a homemaker. She raises their children. Muzafar's eldest son works abroad. He left Tajikistan in order to improve the living conditions of his family. Muzafar's other children (two sons and a daughter) live with him. 

For around two years, Muzafar has been in the business of crop farming. It is his only job and, currently, his only source of income for his family. 

In Tajikistan, winter comes later than in other countries. This is why Muzafar still has a chance to sow wheat on his plot of land. The reason why he is starting to sow his seeds so late is that he did not have enough money. Muzafar decided to take out a loan to buy mineral fertilizers, tractor fuel and wheat grains in order to more quickly finish sowing his seeds. If he does not finish doing this on time then he won't have a harvest in the Spring. Muzafar needs assistance. Please help him!

loans.use: to buy tractor fuel, mineral fertilizers and wheat grains.

loans.name: Stridah

texts.en:
Stridah is 32 years old and lives in the town of Kibuli in Uganda's Kampala South region. She has 3 children who are all currently in school. For the past 6 years, Stridah has been working hard to manage her bar where she sells beer, water, spirits, and wine. 

To help expand her business, Stridah has requested a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to stock more drinks like beer, soda, spirits and water needed by her clients. It will also help Stridah generate greater profits and pay school fees for her children. Stridah hopes that in the future she will be able to expand her business.

Stridah is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Stridah who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to stock more drinks like beer, soda, spirits and water needed by clients

loans.name: Nsubuga

texts.en: Nsubuga is a 24-year-old married woman living in Kagadi, Uganda.  She decided to set up a salon, where she also sells clothes, after dropping out of school due to lack of school fees. She got the start up capital for her business from her husband. Nsubuga has a personal goal of educating her children to attain minimum qualification degrees. She also hopes to build a permanent house since she is currently living in a rented house. Her business plan is to establish a modern salon. Nsubuga is requesting a loan to buy synthetic hair extensions and weaves to sell in her salon. She used her previous loan to buy clothes and hair extensions to sell.

loans.use: to buy synthetic hair extensions and weaves to sell in her salon.

loans.name: Abigael

texts.en: Abigael operates a retail shop, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. Her previous loan helped her to boost her business. Abigael wants to purchase stocks of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour for her business with the loan she is requesting. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business and she appreciated the previous loan.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of sugar, rice, maize flour, and wheat flour for her business.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is a married woman and has been blessed with three kids who attend school. She lives at her own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees for her kids. 

She has been operating a poultry sales business for over 3 years. One challenge in her business is disease outbreaks that cause losses. She dreams of becoming a wholesaler of poultry in the future. 

With the 20,000 KES she wants to purchase chicks and poultry feed to sustain her business and earn good income. She joined Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase chicks and poultry feed for her business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy daily household items to sell in a supermarket

loans.name: Py Renda Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Py Renda está en su ciclo número 15° , donde ellas están dentro del programa de eliminación de pobreza. Al principio todas se encontraban por debajo de la línea de la pobreza, es decir, con ingresos muy escasos, pero gracias al trabajo que hicieron y a las capacitaciones van mejorando.
Una de las integrantes dignas de destacar es la Sra. Romelia quien siempre participa con mucho entusiasmo de las charlas y capacitaciones. Romelia tiene una mercería donde vende todo tipo de artículos, desde cosas para la casa,  hasta prendas y calzados. Ha podido salir adelante y mejorar por su sueño de ser una gran microempresaria.
Pide de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de ropas y calzados para la venta, y así tener un buen stock para sus clientes.
texts.en:
This group is called "Py Renda", and it is currently in its 15th cycle as part of a program for the eradication of poverty. At the beginning, all of these ladies were under the poverty line, with very scarce resources. Thanks to their efforts and the capacity building workshops, they have been able to improve their situations.

A noteworthy member of this group is Romelia, who participates often in the talks and the workshops with lots of enthusiasm. Romelia has a shop where she sells a variety of items, including household items, apparel and shoes. She has been able to get ahead in life and grow towards her dream of becoming a great micro-entrepreneur.

Romelia is requesting this loan to invest in buying clothing and shoes for her business, in order to stock her shop with a wide selection of items for her customers.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes to sell in her business.

loans.name: Remah

texts.en: Remah is 32 years old. She lives with her husband and her three children that attend public primary school in Nablus, Beit Furik. Beit Furik village is a Palestinian town located nine kilometers southeast of Nablus, in the Nablus Governorate in northern West Bank. According to the Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics the town had a population of 10,339 inhabitants in 2007. Remah is asking Ryada for this loan to paint her house and install doors and windows that will help to warm her house, especially now in the winter. She is very grateful to everyone who helps her.

loans.use: to paint her house and install doors and windows

loans.name: Mary's Group

texts.en:
This group is comprised of 4 women from one of Accra's suburbs called Teshie. In the past, these women used to interact with one another through weekly savings group meetings that allowed them to self-finance and support their income-generating activities. With the aim of strengthening the economic power of women, the group has recently entered into partnership with ID-Ghana, Kiva's partner, whose mission is to help them to better manage their activities in a professional way and earn more profits. 

Mary's group is therefore a credit group consisting of women who live in the same neighborhood and are involved in different trading activities including sales of plates, plastic products, pineapple and rice. The group's representative is named Mary. She is a married woman who has been selling pineapple for five years. Mary works from as early as 8:00 AM until 5:00 PM every day. With the profits that she makes from her business, she is able to help cover the daily expenses of the family and save. 

Mary is a member of one of the local branches of ID-Ghana and she is requesting a loan to buy more pineapple and pawpaw to resell to customers. Through this loan, she is hoping to see an increase in her profits. She would also like to contribute to the improvement of her family's nutrition. Her goal is to save some money, and to take care of her children. The groups members need a total amount of 1,450 GHS to support their businesses.

loans.use: to buy more pineapple and pawpaw to resell to customers.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is a married 42-year-old mother of five children. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband from the corner of her house.  She has three years of experience in this field. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stocks of goods from the market from the many contacts that he has maintained over the years.

Parveen is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing, and healthcare. She wants to grow her business, so she has requested a loan to buy flour, rice, packs of salt, biscuits, and beverages to meet increasing demand at her store. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy inventory such as flour, rice, packs of salt, biscuits, and beverages for her general store.

loans.name: Yurik

texts.en:
Yurik has been involved in home supplies delivery for a year already. He lives in Gyumri town with his mother and brother. Yurik purchases different types of home supplies from the city market and delivers it to neighboring village stores. Over the last year of work, Yurik realized that this business activity is sufficiently profitable. 

Now he would like to invest in his business. With this loan Yurik, would like to purchase goods to deliver to stores. Demand has recently increased, because of the coming holidays. Thus, there is an existing high demand in the market. Yurik needs this loan to purchase a new stock of household goods so that he can meet his clients' needs. 

He has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The start-up loan program provides loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. The loan will be a huge help to Yurik's efforts to continue his delivery business and earn more income for his family.

loans.use: to pay for new stocks of household goods for delivery to other stores

loans.name: Dilshod

texts.ru:
Дилшод молодой ювелир в возрасте 23 лет. Он проживает с женой и родителями в районе Хамадони. У Дилшода собственный малый бизнес. Вот уже 2,5 года как Дилшод предоставляет ювелирные услуги, а именно занимается производством, ремонтом и торговлей золотых изделий. Он по индивидуальному заказу клиентов, а также для продажи изготавливает национальные украшения из золота и серебра, которые очень ценятся в стране. Дилшод учился этому ремеслу специально у лучшего мастера и сейчас он сам является лучшим ювелиром. Его ювелирный магазин (в нем у него и мастерская) расположен прямо на центральном рынке района. Это выгодное место для привлечения клиентов. 
Сейчас Дилшод намерен расширить свое ювелирное дело. Он хочет купить модернизированный ювелирный аппарат, чтобы увеличить производство и улучшить качество изготавливаемой продукции. Однако такой аппарат стоит очень дорого и поэтому Дилшод обратился за кредитом. Он очень нуждается в этом кредите и просит дать ему шанс расширить свой бизнес.
texts.en:
Dilshod is a young jeweler who is 23 years old. He lives with his wife and parents in the Hamadoni District. Dilshod is a small business owner. For the past two and a half years, Dilshod has been offering his jewelry making services, namely crafting, repairing and selling gold jewelry. He makes custom orders for clients. He also makes national jewelry to sell out of gold and silver. This type of jewelry is highly valued in Tajikistan. Dilshod studied this trade under the best master craftsman and now he is the best jewelry maker. His jewelry store (including a work shop) is located right in the district's central market. It is an advantageous place to attract clients. 

Now Dilshod is determined to expand his jewelry business. He wants to buy a modernized jewelry making machine in order to increase his production and improve the quality of his finished product. However, this type of machine is very expensive, which is why Dilshod applied for a loan. He really needs this loan and is asking you to give him a chance to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy a jewelry making machine to expand his jewelry business.

loans.name: Fayzali

texts.ru: Файзали 29 лет. Он молодой отец двоих детей. У него сын и дочка. Файзали счастлив в браке. Он женился на любимой девушке. Его жена домохозяйка, она присматривает за детьми, пока Файзали работает на поле. Файзали занимается земледелием. На своем участке он выращивает пшеницу. Сейчас пора заниматься посевом зимней пшеницы. Файзали планирует купить горючей смеси для трактора и пшеничных зерен. После обработки земли он посеет пшеницу и надеется весной получить богатый урожай. К сожалению чтобы приобрести горючей смеси и пшеницу у Файзали не хватает денег. Он просит кредит. Если до прихода зимы Файзали не приобретет нужные средства, он останется без урожая. Для Файзали и его семьи земледелие единственный источник дохода. Он надеется на Вашу поддержку и понимание!
texts.en: Fayzali is 29 years old. He is a young father of two children. He has a son and a daughter. Fayzali has a happy marriage. He married his beloved girlfriend. His wife is a homemaker who looks after their children while Fayzali works in the fields. Fayzali practices crop farming. He grows wheat on his plot of land. Now it is time for the winter sowing of the wheat. Fayzali is planning to buy fuel for his tractor and wheat seeds. After tilling the land, he will sow the seeds and wait until spring to receive a bountiful harvest. Unfortunately, Fayzali does not have enough money to buy fuel and wheat seeds. He is requesting a loan. If he does not get the necessary funds before the onset of winter, he will be left without a harvest. Crop farming is the only source of income for Fayzali and his family. He relies on your support and understanding!

loans.use: To buy wheat seeds and fuel.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.es:
La Señorita Julieta tiene, 21 años, proviene de una Familia trabajadora, su papa se dedica a la construcción con varios años de experiencia, y es un señor muy honesto.
Se animo y con la ayuda de su familia se independizo hace 2 años  con su propio negocio, que consiste en el forrado de termos, estuches y demás, y comenta que le va muy bien en su local donde ya gano muy buena clientela.
Está muy contenta por la oportunidad que se le está brindando, ya que ella es una persona joven con grandes sueños.
Pide de este préstamo para la compra de cueros y cuerinas para poder seguir con su trabajo.
texts.en:
Julieta is 21 years old and comes from a very hard-working family:  her father has been a builder for some years, and is a very honest man.

Two years ago Julieta decided to, with the help of her family, become independent.  She started her own business adding leather and faux leather lining to cases and other items. She tells us that this is going very well on her premises, where she now has a very good customer base.

Julieta is very happy with this opportunity that she is being provided with, as she is young and has great dreams.

Julieta is applying for this loan in order to buy leathers and faux leathers in order to continue with her work.

loans.use: to buy  leathers and faux leathers.

loans.name: Mohbonu

texts.ru: Мохбону молодая жительница района Яван. Ей 23 года. Она работает учительницей в средней школе. Мохбону еще не замужем. Она живет с матерью, младшим братом и сестрой. Мохбону в жизни упорная и целеустремленная. Если она ставит перед собой какую-либо цель, то она добивается ее. Сейчас ее главная цель - открыть собственный бизнес и улучшить финансовое положение семьи. Ее давно интересует сфера торговли, купля-продажа женской одежды и считает это прибыльным бизнесом. Мохбону уже накопила сбережение в размере 500 долларов США, однако чтобы закупить товар ей не хватает еще 2000 долларов США. Эту сумму она просит в кредит. Мохбону уже на рынке района приобрела торговую точку, на сумму кредита и сбережения она хочет привести коллекцию зимней женской одежды с оптового рынка столицы и продавать в своей точке по розничной цене. Ей в бизнесе будет помогать мать.
texts.en: Mohbonu is a young resident of the Yavan District. She is 23 years old. She works as a teacher in a secondary school. Mohbonu is unmarried. She lives with her mother and her young brother and sister.  Mohbonu is a strong-minded and driven person. If she sets a goal for herself, she will achieve it. Now her main goal is opening her own business and improving the financial situation of her family. She has been interested in the field of retail for a long time, specifically buying and selling of women's clothing and considers it a profitable business. Mohbonu has already saved funds in the amount of 500 USD, however, in order to buy merchandise, she needs an additional 2,000 USD. She is requesting a loan for this amount. Mohbonu has already bought her retail space at the market. With the loan and her savings, she wants to buy a winter collection of women's clothing from a wholesale market in the capital and sell them at her stall for a higher price. Her mother will help her with the business.

loans.use: to buy seasonal women's clothing to start her retail business.

loans.name: Mauricio

texts.es: Mauricio, a sus 39 años de edad, se dedica a la floricultura desde hace aproximadamente un año, gracias a las enseñanzas de su madre quien posee cultivos de hortensias de comercio nacional; sus cultivos están ubicados en un terreno por lotes de su propiedad, allí trabaja de lunes a viernes y cuenta con el apoyo de una empleada por días, quien le colabora los fines de semana cuando él maneja un taxi para complementar los ingresos mensuales. El cliente se caracteriza por su pujanza, esmero y dedicación, ha sobrepasado diversos inconvenientes, debido a su falta de experiencia en este campo de acción, sin embargo, con perseverancia ha logrado sacar adelante sus cultivos. Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para invertirlo en activos fijos (máquina estacionaria y un sarán) e insumos agrícolas al por mayor (abonos, pesticidas, fungicidas, entre otros), esto le permitirá continuar con su labor de una manera más organizada y podrá proteger mejor sus cultivos de la radiación solar y de los diversos insectos que ponen en riesgo la producción; esto dará como resultado una excelente cosecha de flores que podrán ser vendidas a mejor precio y se generará un nivel más alto de utilidades. De esta forma, Mauricio desea continuar con su labor, fortalecer aún más su negocio y en un futuro, poder cumplir el sueño de tener cultivos de hortensias de exportación; pues ve en esta labor una gran fuente de ingresos que a largo plazo puede significar una mejor calidad de vida para él y su familia.
texts.en: At 39-years-old, Mauricio has now been making a living growing flowers for about a year.  He was taught the trade by his mother, who has flowers that she sells across the country.  Mauricio's flowers are grown on lots of land that he owns and he works there from Monday to Friday.  Mauricio has the support of an employee who works at the weekend, while he drives a taxi in order to boost his monthly income.  Mauricio is known for his drive, the care he gives his work, and his dedication.  He has overcome various difficulties that have arisen due to his lack of experience but he has managed to get ahead with his crops.  Mauricio is now applying for a loan to invest in fixed assets (stationary machinery and a plastic sheet) and farming supplies (manure, pesticides, fungicides, and more) in bulk.  This will allow Mauricio to continue with his work in a more organised fashion, and he will be able to better protect his crops from the sun and the various insects that pose a risk to his crops.  The result of this will be an excellent harvest of flowers that can be sold at a better price and which will generate higher profits. Mauricio wants to continue with his work, further strengthen his business and, in the future, be able to achieve his dream of having to flowers to export.  He thinks that this will be a great source of income which, in the long run, will mean a higher quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to invest in fixed assets (stationary machinery and a plastic sheet) and farming supplies (manure, pesticides, fungicides, and more) in bulk.

loans.name: María Edid

texts.es: María, a sus 65 años de edad, es casada y madre de 4 hijos. Hace aproximadamente 13 años decidió emprender su propio negocio, con el fin de generar ingresos para aportar a la economía de su hogar; por ello inició vendiendo cremas y helados elaborados por ella desde la comodidad de su casa, pero poco a poco fue introduciendo más productos que iban solicitando sus clientes, hasta convertir su negocio en la tienda de abarrotes que es hoy en día. Trabaja sola todos los días y hasta el momento ha tenido muy buenos resultados. Su tenacidad, perseverancia y dedicación le han permitido lograr los objetivos que se propone, por ello solicita el crédito, pues su interés es seguir creciendo y por ello desea comprar surtido al por mayor (lácteos, huevos, panela, chocolate, café, galletería, productos cárnicos, entre otros), de esta manera se abastecerá lo suficiente para satisfacer la demanda que aumenta en la temporada de fin de año, logrando así un incremento en las ventas y en los ingresos que recibe por su labor. Es así como María sueña con hacer crecer su negocio y aumentar la clientela, para que eso le garantice una estabilidad económica favorable, que le permita disfrutar una vejez más tranquila al lado de las personas que ama.
texts.en: María is 65 years old, married, and a mother to four children.  Some 13 years ago, María decided to start her own business, in order to earn in an income to support her household.  So, she started by selling creams and ice-creams, which she produced from the comfort of her own home.  Little by little, she started selling more products that her customers requested, until the business turned into the grocery store that it now is.  María works alone every day and, so far, she has had good results with her business.  María's tenacity, her perseverance, and her dedication have allowed her to achieve her own goals.  She is now applying for a loan as she wants to continue expanding and so wants to buy stock (dairy products, eggs, brown sugar loafs, chocolate, coffee, biscuits, meat products, and more) in bulk.  With all this she can satisfy the increased demand that comes at the end of the year and she will have an increase in sales and in her income.  It is through this loan that María dreams of expanding her business and increasing her customer base so that she can guarantee more financial stability that will allow her to enjoy her old age in peace with the people she loves.

loans.use: to buy stock (dairy products, eggs, brown sugar loafs, chocolate, coffee, biscuits, meat products, and more) in bulk.

loans.name: Irma Violeta

texts.es:
Irma Violeta tiene 64 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Oyotun, su población se dedica al cultivo de arroz, café y maíz, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella tiene un Bar-Restaurant donde ofrece comida preparada y cerveza, es conocida por el buen sabor de los platos que ofrece, ha solicitado un préstamo de 4 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mesas y sillas para equipar el local donde está ubicado su negocio, compra de cerveza para hacer crecer su negocio y de esta manera tener mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Irma Violeta is 64 years old and lives in the District of Oyotun. Her town is known for the cultivation of rice, coffee, and corn; as well as for trade and livestock breeding. This community is two hours away from the city of Chiclayo, which is on the northern coast of Peru.

Irma has a bar and restaurant where she offers prepared foods and beer. Her establishment is well-known for the dishes that are offered. She is requesting a loan of 4,000 PEN in order to buy tables and chairs to furnish the area where her business is located. Irma will also buy beer so that her business will grow, which will result in more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, and beer for her business.

loans.name: Kwesiima  Group

texts.en:
Hadijah is a 33-year-old business lady who deals in cosmetics. She is a member of Kwesiima Group. Hadijah has been in business for a good number of years. This business has helped her to meet the basic needs of her family. She is hardworking and determined to keep her business growing to ensure a good sustainable income for the family.

She has now applied for a loan of 400,000UGX to buy more cosmetics and increase the range of products. She especially wants to buy the cosmetics that are on high demand. Hadijah is glad to have the opportunity to get this loan.

loans.use: to buy more cosmetics for her shop.

loans.name: Siempre Juntas Group

texts.es: “SIEMPRE JUNTAS” es una alcancía conformado por 06 socias. Rosa de 68 años es una de ellas, ella es casada y tiene 03 hijos mayores de edad. Al igual que los demás miembros de la alcancía ella también es una prospera comerciante, hace varios años tiene una jugueria donde vende toda clase de desayunos a base de jugos de frutas y sándwiches, también realiza trabajos de limpieza en casas, gracias a los ingresos que percibe puede ayudar a su familia. El préstamo que ha solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de frutas y cereales para su negocio, en el futuro desea comprarse una casa para poder vivir tranquilamente. Rosa quiere agradecer a los inversionistas KIVA por este préstamo para su grupo ya que es una oportunidad para mejorar con sus ingresos, en la foto esta vestida con casaca color roja.
texts.en:
"Siempre Juntas" (Always Together) is a Communal Bank that consists of six members.

Rosa is 68 years old and one of its members. She is married and has three grown children. Like the other members of her Communal Bank, Rosa is a successful merchant. She has a managed a juice shop where she serves all types of fruit juices, breakfast foods, and sandwiches. Rosa also cleans houses. Thanks to the income she has earned, she has been able to help her family.

The loan she is requesting will be invested in fruits and cereals for her business. In the future, she would like to buy a house where she can live peacefully. Rosa would like to thank the Kiva lenders for this loan to her group since it is an opportunity for them to improve their incomes. In the photo, Rosa is the woman wearing a red jacket.

loans.use: to buy fruits and cereals.

loans.name: César Augusto

texts.es: César es un joven de 24 años de edad, padre de una hija de 1 año y vive en unión libre con su pareja sentimental. Actualmente trabaja como mayordomo en una finca, actividad que aprendió de su padre y que le ha servido para realizar las diversas labores de manera ágil y correcta. Con el ánimo de mejorar sus ingresos se le ocurrió la idea de criar peces y aves, para lo cual cuenta con el consentimiento de su jefe para aprovechar un espacio que hay disponible en la finca en la que vive y trabaja. Por esta razón solicita el crédito para invertirlo en la reparación de los tanques para almacenar los peces, comprar peces cachama y más pollos para engorde, adicionalmente el cuido y alimento para los animales; así podrá aumentar la producción de aves y comenzará a incursionar en el mercado de peces, lo que le permitirá mejorar los ingresos familiares para sustentar todas las necesidades del hogar. César manifiesta que su principal meta es velar por el bienestar de su familia y auto sustentarse, pues desea independizarse totalmente en un futuro, para generar mayor rentabilidad en su negocio y dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
César is 24 years old, has a one-year-old daughter and lives with his partner.  He currently works as a foreman on a farm, a skill which he learnt from his father and which has helped him to be flexible and accurate in carrying out various jobs. With the aim of increasing his income he came up with the idea of raising chickens and fish, and he has the approval of his boss to make use of an available space on the farm where he lives and works.

This is why he is asking for a loan to repair the tanks for keeping the fish, to buy cachama fish and more chickens for fattening and also pay for feeding and looking after the animals. By doing this he will be able to increase the number of birds produced and start out supplying fish for the market. This will help him to improve his family income to meet all of the household needs. 

César says his main objective is to look after his family's wellbeing and support himself. He wants to become totally independent in the future to make his business more profitable and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to repair the tanks for keeping fish, to buy cachama (a type of fish) and more chickens for fattening, as well as to pay for feeding and looking after the animals.

loans.name: Heriberto De Jesús

texts.es: Heriberto, a sus 56 años, se dedica a atender su propio negocio, una tienda de abarrotes que inició como una alternativa para emplearse y generar recursos para llevar el sustento a su hogar; inició hace varios años, producto de la dificultad para emplearse en una empresa por su edad; esto lo motivó a buscar nuevas opciones que le permitieran salir adelante y luchar por el bienestar de su familia, conformada por su esposa y sus 6 hijos. Trabaja solo, de lunes a domingo de 7:00 am a 10:00 pm, nunca tomó clases, ni se capacitó en el manejo de este tipo de actividad, aprendió por el método de prueba/error y, poco a poco ha estabilizado su negocio y ha logrado ser reconocido en el sector donde está ubicado. Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar surtido al por mayor (granos, gaseosas, cervezas, lácteos, confitería, mecato, galletería, entre otros), esto le permitirá abastecerse lo suficiente para satisfacer la demanda que aumenta con la llegada de la temporada de navidad, en la que sus ventas e ingresos tienden a incrementar. Es así como Heriberto quiere seguir luchando por el bienestar y la estabilidad económica familiar, pues anhela poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida durante los años que Dios y su cuerpo se lo permitan.
texts.en: Heriberto, who is 56, works in his own business, a grocery shop which he set up as an alternative form of employment and means of generating income to support his family.  He began this several years ago, having found it difficult to find work in a business due to his age.  This motivated him to look for new options which would allow him to make progress and attend to the well-being of his family, consisting of his wife and 6 children.  He works alone, seven days a week from 7am to 10pm and, never having been educated or received training in how to manage a business of this type, he learned the ropes by trial and error.  He has gradually stabilised his business and become well known in the local area.  He is currently applying for the loan to buy stock (grains, fizzy drinks, beer, dairy products, sweets, snacks, biscuits, etc.) in bulk, which will mean that he has enough to satisfy demand which is rising now that Christmas is approaching and his sales and income tend to increase.  In this way, Heriberto wants to keep striving to achieve financial stabilityand well-being for his family, his ambition being to provide them with a better quality of life for as long as God and his body allow.

loans.use: to buy stock (grains, fizzy drinks, beer, dairy products, sweets, snacks, biscuits, etc) in bulk

loans.name: Sharofat

texts.ru: Добрый человек, который всегда старается улучшить условию проживания, и надеется на светлое будущее, нуждается финансовой поддержки. Ее зовут Шарофат. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. Так как она живет в сельской местности, так и имеет хорошую возможность для развития своего бизнеса, скотоводством. Она более10 лет занимается скотоводством и имеет большой опыт по данной отрасли бизнеса. Она хочет развевать бизнес и получать больше дохода. С полученного дохода она планирует улучшить условию проживания. Шарофат запрашивает займ на сумму 4000 сомони для покупки скота. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: A kind person who is always striving to improve her living conditions and hopes for a bright future needs financial assistance. Her name is Sharofat. She is married and is raising one baby. As she lives in a rural area, she has a great opportunity to develop her business of cattle breeding. For more than 10 years, she has practiced cattle breeding and has a lot of experience in her current sector of business. She wants to develop her business and earn a bigger income. With the received earnings, she plans to improve her living conditions. Sharofat is requesting a loan in the amount of 4000 somoni to buy cattle. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle to increase her working capital.

loans.name: Parvina

texts.ru:
Парвина жительница района Хамадони. Ей 35 лет. У Парвины четверо детей (два сына и две дочки). Ее муж находится заграницей на заработках. Старший сын Парвины помогает ей по работе. Она работает поваром в столовой. В основном она готовит национальные блюда. Парвина очень вкусно готовит супы и другие национальные блюда. 
   Парвина активная женщина она успевает работать и в столовой и дома. Парвина хочет дополнительно дома у себя заняться скотоводством. Она хочет купить только одну корову, чтобы корова обеспечивала ее детей свежим молоком. У Парвины не хватает средств для покупки коровы, по этой причине она обратилась за кредитом. Парвина хочет, чтобы ее дети питались здоровой пищей и всегда получали необходимое количество витаминов.
texts.en:
Parvina is a resident of the Hamadoni District. She is 35 years old. Parvina has four children (two sons and two daughters). Her husband works abroad. Parvina's eldest son helps her with her work. She works as a chef in a cafeteria.  She mainly cooks Tajik dishes. Parvina makes very delicious soups and other Tajik dishes. 

Parvina is an active women. She finds time to work both at the cafeteria and at home. Parvina wants to additionally take up cattle raising at home. She wants to buy just one cow in order to provide her children with fresh milk. Parvina does not have enough money to buy a cow, which is why she requested a loan. Parvina wants her children to eat healthy food and always receive the necessary amount of vitamins.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
Maritza tiene 34 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos en San José una zona rural de Pucará, su población se dedica al cultivo de arroz, frutales, comercio y ganadería, a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves como gallinas, patos, pavos, distribuyéndolos a los caseríos aledaños a su comunidad, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes y así generar mayores ingresos a su familia.
texts.en:
Maritza is 34 years old and lives with her husband and children in San José, a rural section of Pucará. Her town is known for the cultivation of rice and fruit, trade, and also livestock breeding. This community is located two hours from the city of Jaén, which is in the northern mountains of Peru.

Maritza raises and sells animals such as chickens, ducks, and turkeys. She delivers them to the surrounding neighborhoods of her community. Maritza is requesting a loan of 1,000 PEN in order to buy balanced feed. This will result in better production so that she can offer more animals to her customers and generate additional income for her family.

loans.use: to buy balanced animal feed.

loans.name: María Purificación

texts.es: María, a sus 60 años de edad, se dedica a trabajar como comerciante independiente vendiendo mercancía, especialmente pijamas para dama, caballeros y niños, lleva aproximadamente 10 años realizando esta labor y, gracias a su trayectoria tiene una amplia clientela, a la cual le da plazo de 30 días para el pago de los productos; trabaja sola desde su casa y, de esa forma genera los recursos suficientes para aportar a la economía de su familia, conformada por su esposo y dos hijos. Su pujanza, tenacidad y el esmero con el que realiza su actividad, le han permitido salir adelante; esto la impulsa a solicitar el crédito con el que desea comprar surtido de mercancía al por mayor (pijamas), así podrá tener amplia variedad para satisfacer los gustos y requerimientos de sus clientes, logrando aumentar las ventas en esta temporada de navidad que se aproxima, lo que le permitirá aumentar el margen de ganancia por cada venta. De esta forma, María quiere seguir luchando para salir adelante y poder cumplir el sueño de hacerle mejoras a su vivienda, lo que le permitirá disfrutar de un mejor bienestar y calidad de vida en compañía de los que ama.
texts.en:
María is 60 years old and earns a living as an independent trader selling merchandise, particularly pyjamas for men, women and children. She has been doing this for approximately 10 years and, because of the length of time she has been selling, she has a large clientele, whom she gives 30 days' credit to pay for the items. 

María works alone from home and by doing this work she makes enough money to contribute to the family finances. Her family is made up of her husband and her two children. The drive, tenacity and dedication she puts into her work have enabled her to make progress in life. 

This leads her to ask for the loan which she wants to use to buy goods wholesale (pyjamas) so she can have a wide variety to satisfy her customers' tastes and needs. This will enable her to increase her sales during the approaching Christmas period, which will give her a bigger profit margin for each sale.  

María wants to continue striving to make progress in this way and wants to be able to fulfil her dream of making some improvements to her home, which will mean she can enjoy a better quality of life and wellbeing with the people she loves.

loans.use: to buy assorted merchandise wholesale (pyjamas).

loans.name: Mery Del Socorro

texts.es: Mery, con 66 años de edad, es casada y madre de 4 hijos a los que ha sacado adelante con esfuerzo y dedicación. Hace 14 años trabaja como vendedora ambulante de café, aromáticas y alimentos fritos que ella misma preparaba, los productos eran vendidos en una esquina cercana a un hospital, un colegio y una iglesia; de esta manera generaba los recursos para sustentar las necesidades básicas del hogar; pero poco tiempo después, adquirió un préstamo y asesoría para mejorar la rentabilidad de su negocio, por lo que se motivó a transformar su pequeño puesto de trabajo, a un quiosco bien establecido en el que sigue vendiendo sus productos y comenzó a introducir nuevos alimentos, pues dispuso un carro de comidas rápidas. Actualmente solicita el apoyo de su segundo ciclo de crédito, con el que desea comprar surtido al por mayor (mecato, gaseosas, alimentos fritos pre elaborados, café, aromáticas, entre otros), esto le permitirá abastecerse lo suficiente para satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa en la temporada de fin de año; dando como resultado un mejoramiento notable en las ventas y las ganancias que obtiene por su labor. Mery sueña con fortalecer y darle continuidad y permanencia en el tiempo a su negocio, pues con él ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia y desea continuar haciéndolo hasta que Dios y su cuerpo se lo permitan, para poder disfrutar en un futuro, de una vejez más tranquila y en regocijo con los que ama.
texts.en:
Mery, 66, is married and the mother of four children whom she has gotten ahead with effort and dedication.  She has worked for 14 years as a street vendor of coffee, spices, and fried food that she herself made.  She sold the products on a corner near a hospital, a school, and a church.  This way she generated the income to support the basic needs of her household.

A short time later she acquired a loan and advice for improving the profitability of her business.  This motivated her to turn her small working place into a well-established kiosk where she continues selling her products.  She started to introduce new dishes because she got a fast food cart.

Currently Mery's requesting the support of a second loan cycle to buy supplies wholesale (pastry, soda, prepared fried foods, coffee, spices, and so forth).  This will allow her to stock up enough to satisfy demand, which increases at the end of the year.  The result will be a considerable improvement in the sales and profits she earns from her job.

Mery dreams of strengthening and keeping up her business over time because she has managed to get her family ahead with it.  She wants to continue doing this as long as God and her body allow so in the future she can enjoy more peaceful senior years in the company of those she loves.

loans.use: to buy supplies wholesale

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is a married woman and a mother of three young children. She is from Talibon, Bohol. Merlinda and her husband operate a tricycle business. This is to transport passengers from one place to another. This is the source of their income.
Merlinda is asking for a loan to buy spare parts like nuts, bolts and fuel for the tricycle. With this, they will be able to improve the good working condition of the tricycle. In the future, Merlinda hopes of making their business a success. Moreover, she wants to save money for the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy spare parts like nuts, bolts and fuel for the tricycle.

loans.name: Jonathan

texts.es:
Jonathan es hijo de camionero y  su madre es ama de casa, él es hermano de 2 mujeres una de ellas es abogada y la otra está cursando el cursillo de despachante. Las metas que él tiene es llegar a ser un profesional competente para así poder mejorar su estilo de vida y la de su familia. Aspira llegar a los más alto de esta carrera, y comenta que está estudiando la carrera de contador público, que con mucho sacrificio está terminando.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus cuotas que le permitirá seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Jonathan is the son of a truck driver and a housewife. He has two sisters, one is a lawyer and the other is training to become a dispatcher. His goals include becoming a competent professional so that he can improve his lifestyle and that of his family.

He says that he aspires to a higher position in his career, so he is studying for a degree in Public Accounting, which will require a great deal of sacrifice to complete. Jonathan is requesting this loan so that he can invest in the payments for his degree, which will enable him to continue his studies.

loans.use: to pay for his university expenses.

loans.name: Adela

texts.es: Adela de 66 años de edad habita junto a su esposo y su nieto de 18 años de edad, ella se dedica al comercio de zapatos y sandalias tanto para dama como caballero. Este negocio lo realiza junto a su esposo y tienen que viajar a otro municipio para hacer sus ventas. Con el fin de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mercadería como: variedad de sandalias y zapatos tanto para dama como para caballero. Espera poder contar con este apoyo ya que no tiene el capital para hacer el desembolso por su cuenta pero si tiene la capacidad de pago que el financiamiento implica.
texts.en: Adela is 66 years old. She lives with her husband and 18 year old grandson. She works selling shoes and sandals for both men and women. She works at this business with her husband and they have to travel to another town to so their selling. In order to improve her quality of life and that of her family, she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying merchandise such as a variety of sandals and shoes for both men and women. She hopes to be able to have this support since she doesn't have the capital to pay for it on her own but she does have the capacity to make the loan payments.

loans.use: to buy a variety of sandals and shoes for men and women.

loans.name: Lilian Maricela

texts.es: Lilian de 34 años de edad reside en casa propia junto a su grupo familia el cual está constituido por su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos de 14 años, 13 años y 5 años de edad. Para ella lo más importante es que sus hijos cuenten con mejores condiciones de vida a las que ella y su compañero de vida han tenido acceso. Desde hace tres años logró establecer una pequeña granja de pollos los cuales engorda para luego venderlos. Este negocio es el que le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones de vida desea invertir en su granja ya que confía que con una mayor oferta de pollo sus ventas incrementarán ya que muchas veces la demanda es mayor a lo que ella ofrece. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de pollo de engorde, concentrado y vitaminas.
texts.en:
Lilian, 34, lives in her own house with her family, made up of her life partner and her three children, ages 14, 13, and 5.  The most important thing to her is for her children to have better living conditions than she and her partner have had access to.

Three years ago she was able to set up a small chicken farm where she fattens chickens to sell.  This business is what allows her to support her family on a daily basis.  She wants to invest in her farm so she can improve her living conditions.  She's confident that with more chickens her sales will increase, because often demand is greater than what she has.

This is why Lilian's requesting this loan from FUSAI to buy chickens to fatten, concentrated feed, and vitamins.

loans.use: to buy chickens, concentrated feed, and vitamins

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es: María, inició con su actividad de confección hace varios años, idea que surgió de la necesidad y la crisis económica por la que pasaba su familia; ya con la experiencia que había obtenido mientras trabajaba en diferentes talleres de confección, decidió emprender su propio taller, trabajando con una máquina de coser sencilla y confeccionando sobre moldes, pero cuando requería hacer recubrimientos o fileteado debía alquilar una máquina por horas o esperar a que se la prestaran. Luego de obtener una asesoría sobre el negocio para hacer de su taller un establecimiento versátil en el que confeccionara sobre medida y no sobre moldes, ella se motiva a solicitar el crédito, con el que desea comprar una máquina plana industrial para cambiar su antigua máquina y así agilizar el proceso de producción y ser más eficiente y competitiva; todo esto, debido al espíritu de superación y perseverancia que la impulsan a luchar por sus objetivos. Los ingresos que recibe por su actividad, son destinados para aportar a la economía de su familia, conformada por su esposo y 3 hijos. María sólo desea seguir fortaleciendo su negocio y hacer de él, un taller versátil que le permita prestar el servicio tanto de modistería directa como de confección a terceros, mejorando así la rentabilidad de su negocio y logrando garantizar una estabilidad financiera para dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: It is some years now since María set up her dressmaking business, an idea which resulted from necessity and the economic crisis which was affecting her family.  So, using the experience she had acquired working in other clothing factories, she decided to set up her own workshop, using a simple sewing machine and patterns.  However, when she wanted to make linings or do overlocking she had to hire a machine for a number of hours or wait until someone could lend her one.  Then, when she received business guidance on how to make her workshop more versatile so that she could make clothing to measure rather than by using patterns, she was motivated to seek the loan.  She would like to use it to replace her old sewing machine with an industrial flatbed one, which will enable her to streamline the production process and make her more efficient and competitive.  All this is because of her indomitable spirit and perseverance which drive her on in pursuit of her ambitions.  Her income from her business goes to contribute to the budget of her family, which consists of her husband and 3 sons.  María's one desire is to continue strengthening her business and to make it a versatile workshop so she can offer her services to direct customers as well as third parties.  This will improve her business's profitability and guarantee the financial stability which will allow her to provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy an industrial flatbed sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fashion clothes for her business.

loans.name: Ana Yenci

texts.es: Ana de 25 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y su pequeño hijo. Ana es una mujer emprendedora ya que busca las oportunidades del mercado para poner sus negocios. Ella se dedica a la vena de gas propano y además tiene un molino de nixtamal en el que muele variedad de semillas tales como: maíz, arroz, frijoles, etc. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos y es el que le permite sacar el ingreso para ayudar en la economía del hogar. Lastimosamente su molino se le ha dañado el motor por lo que no está funcionando situación que le está causando mucha inestabilidad ya que no está percibiendo ese ingreso, solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de gas propano y un nuevo motor eléctrico para su molino y de esta forma reactivar el negocio que tanta falta le hace.
texts.en:
Ana is 25 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and small son. Ana is an enterprising woman and looks for opportunities in the market where she can set up her businesses. She makes a living selling propane gas and also has a mill which she uses to grind a variety of grains such as corn, rice, beans etc. This business is her main source of income and is the business she can take an income from to help with the household finances.

Unfortunately the mill's motor has been damaged and so it is not working. This situation is causing Ana financial problems as she is not getting this income. She is asking for this loan from FUSAI to buy propane gas and a new electric motor for her mill so she can reactivate the business which she badly needs.

loans.use: to buy an electric motor for a corn mill and propane gas.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es: Estela de 44 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus cuatro hijos. Estela se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comales y ollas a base de barro de forma artesanal. De esta forma colabora con la economía del hogar y junto a su esposo van sacando adelante a su familia. Su vivienda es sencilla y humilde la cual desea hacer algunos arreglos como es el caso de la cubierta del techo que se encuentra deteriorado y necesita cambio. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de polines, lámina galvanizada, y pines. Expresa tener la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Estela is 44 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband and her four children. Estela works making and selling handmade clay comales and pots. In this way she helps with the household budget and together with her husband they get the family ahead. Her home is simple and humble and she wants to do some repairs, for example on the roof covering. It has deteriorated and needs to be changed. She is asking FUSAI for this loan in order to buy rods, galvanized sheeting and tacks. She says she is able to make the loan payments.

loans.use: to buy rods, galvanized sheeting, and tacks to repair the roof covering on her house.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Ángela de 52 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su hijo. Ángela se dedica a la venta de pupusas (preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz, frijoles, queso, etc.) y a la elaboración y venta de variedad de artesanías.  Trabaja muy duro para mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Con el fin de mejorar su situación habitacionales desea ampliar una habitación de su vivienda, el cual es muy pequeño y las paredes se encuentran deterioradas. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, grava, arena, hierro y cemento.
texts.en:
Angela is 52 years old and is a single mother. She lives in her own house with her son. Angela makes a living selling pupusas (food product made from corn, beans, cheese etc.) and making and selling handicrafts. She works very hard to improve her quality of life.

In order to improve her living conditions she wants to extend a room in her home which is very small and where the walls have deteriorated. This is why she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to buy bricks, gravel, and, iron and cement.

loans.use: to buy bricks, gravel, and, iron and cement, to extend a room in her home.

loans.name: Maria Ana

texts.es: A sus 57 años de edad María trabaja duramente para sacar adelante a su familia. Habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y tres hijos de 27 años, 24 años y 16 años de edad. María se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos todos los días se levanta muy temprano para hacer los quehaceres de su casa y luego sale a lavar y planchar ajeno. Su deseo es dar mejores condiciones habitacionales a su familia por lo que desea reparar el techo y el piso de su vivienda,  razón por la  que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, arena y cemento para hacer las reparaciones lo antes posible.
texts.en: At 57 years old, María works hard to get her family ahead. She lives in her own home with her husband and three children, aged 27, 24 and 16. María works in domestic service. She gets up early every day to do the housework and the goes out to wash and iron for other people. She wants to give her family better living conditions and so wants to repair the roof and floor of her home. That is why she is asking FUSAI for this loan to buy galvanized sheeting, wood, sand and cement to do the repairs as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, wood, sand and cement to repair the roof and floor of her home.

loans.name: Fatima Del Carmen

texts.es: Fátima de 22 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida, sus condiciones habitacionales son muy humildes pero poco a poco va haciendo las mejoraras necesarias. Fátima trabaja como vendedora de una tienda de su localidad y junto a su compañero de vida van saliendo adelante poco a poco. Actualmente la cocina la tiene al aire libre por lo que desea construir un cuarto para proteger sus pocas pertenencias. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la  construcción de la cocina para lo cual necesita material como: lámina galvanizada, polines, cemento y pines para sujetar la lámina.
texts.en: Fátima is 22 years old and lives in her own home along with her life partner.  Her living conditions are very humble, but little by little she has been making the necessary improvements.  Fátima works as a salesperson in a store in her town and together with her life partner they are getting ahead little by little.  Currently her kitchen is open air, and she would like to build a room in order to protect her few belongings.  She is asking for this loan from Kiva partner FUSAI in order to invest in the construction of a kitchen for which she needs material like galvanized metal sheets, poles, cement, and wood in order to hold up the metal sheets.

loans.use: To buy galvanized metal sheets, poles, cement, and wood for the building of a kitchen.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro vive solo, sus padres son del interior y  hace más de 3 años que está  viviendo en Pilar.
Comenta que vino para poder realizar sus estudios terciarios y este año los está culminando, espera conseguir un trabajo acorde con el estudio que realiza y así poder ayudar a sus padres por todo lo que le dieron hasta el día de hoy. Él está estudiando la carrera de Comercio Internacional, el cual le abrirá muchas puertas.
Pide de este crédito para poder cubrir sus cuotas de la universidad. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Pedro lives alone. His parents are from the interior of the country, but he has been living in Pilar for more than three years.
